Package seng201.team53.game.items.towers

Class Tower

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.items.towers.Tower
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item, Upgradeable
public class Tower extends Object implements Item, Upgradeable
Represents a tower in the game. Each tower has a type, broken property, last generate property, generate timeline, reload speed modifier and an XP level

  • Constructor Details

    • Tower

      protected Tower(TowerType type)
      Constructs a new tower with the given type
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • canGenerate

      public boolean canGenerate()
      Checks if the tower is ready to generate a resource
      Returns:
      true if the tower is ready to generate, false otherwise

    • addReloadSpeedModifier

      public void addReloadSpeedModifier()
      Adds a reload speed modifier of 0.25. Everytime this method is called, it will generate resources 50% faster, until the modifier is reset

    • minusReloadModifier

      public void minusReloadModifier()
      Takes away a reload speed modifier of 0.25. Everytime this method is called, it will generate resources 50% faster, until the modifier is reset

    • resetReloadSpeedModifier

      public void resetReloadSpeedModifier()
      Resets the reload speed modifier. The tower will generate at its original rate

    • getPurchasableType

      public TowerType getPurchasableType()
      Retrieves the towers purchasable type
      Specified by:
      getPurchasableType in interface Item
      Returns:
      The type of tower

      The observable broken property

    • isBroken

      public boolean isBroken()
      Retrieves the broken boolean of the tower
      Returns:
